template.name: searchMapper
template.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" > <mapper namespace = "${packageName}.dao.excel.SearchMapper"> <select id = "searchMsg" parameterType = "String" resultType = "Map"> ${r'$'}{parameter} <where> ${r'$'}{where} </where> </select>
<insert id = "insertMsg" parameterType = "String"> ${r'$'}{parameter} </insert> </mapper>
